Publications

A selected list of works that I have contributed to. Please look up my NASA ADS Page linked in the bottom for more publications.

2021

  1. ApJL
    Continued Radio Observations of GW170817 3.5 yr Post-merger

    2021, Astrophysical Journal Letters, 914, L20
    ADS
  2. arXiv
    Radio observations of SN2004dk with VLITE confirm late-time re-brightening

    2021, arXiv e-prints, arXiv:2101.07348
    ADS
  3. ApJ
    The JAGWAR Prowls LIGO/Virgo O3 Paper I: Radio Search of a Possible Multimessenger Counterpart of the Binary Black Hole Merger Candidate S191216ap
    Bhakta, D., Mooley, K. P., Corsi, A., Balasubramanian, A., Dobie, D., Frail, D. A., Hallinan, G., Kaplan, D. L., Myers, S. T., and Singer, L. P.

    ADS
